snippet: With its banks heavily exposed to Greek debt, the country is nervously watching Greece’s crisis unfold.
abstract: Cyprus says it could soon seek a European Union bailout to support its struggling banks, even as it indicates it is continuing to pursue other options, including a possible bilateral loan from Russia.
lead_paragraph: With its banks heavily exposed to Greek debt, the country is nervously watching Greece’s crisis unfold.

headline.seo: Cyprus Weighs European Bailout or Loan From Russia
headline.main: Cyprus Weighs Russian Loan or a Bailout From Europe
headline.print_headline: Cyprus Weighs Russian Loan Or a Bailout From Europe
